author: Special Correspondent
text:
A mega science fair gets going on Friday at the Petit Seminaire Higher Secondary School.

Screening of models

The 356 models and 10 projects screened from about 530 and 20 entries respectively will be showcased at the event.

S.K. Shivakumar, former director of the Indian Space Research Organisation Satellite Tracking System, will inaugurate the science fair.

Interactive session

He will also host an interactive session for which Plus 1 and Plus 2 students from other schools have also been invited.

A planetarium is a special feature of the two-day event.
title: Mega science fair today
